component.name: insertRecords
component.description: Insert records into the required Zoho CRM module

component.name: getRecords
component.description: Fetch all users data specified in the API request

component.name: getRecordsById
component.description: Retrieve individual records by record ID

component.name: updateRecords
component.description: Update or modify the records in Zoho CRM

component.name: getSearchRecords
component.description: Search records by expressions of the selected columns

component.name: updateRelatedRecords
component.description: Update records related to another record
